statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity
SELECT activity_timestamp FROM user_activity
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, activity_timestamp, NOW())) AS minutes_since_activity FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, JSON_EXTRACT(activity_details, '$.location') AS location FROM user_activity
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(activity_details, JSON_OBJECT('status', 'active'))
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_details->'$.duration' > '30'
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_type = 'logout'
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01T00:00:00' AND activity_timestamp <= '2022-01-31T23:59:59'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5
SELECT JSON_KEYS(activity_details) AS keys FROM user_activity
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY)
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_timestamp) = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id, activity_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'location') AS location FROM user_activity WHERE json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'status') = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE 'login%' AND activity_timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND activity_timestamp < '2024-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_array_elements_text(activity_details->'tags') AS tag FROM user_activity WHERE json_array_length(activity_details->'tags') > 3;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'category') AS category FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' AND date_trunc('day', activity_timestamp) = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'reference_id') AS reference_id FROM user_activity WHERE json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'category') = 'payment';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM activity_timestamp) = 2023;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'email') AS email FROM user_activity WHERE json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'status') = 'active';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'category') AS category FROM user_activity WHERE json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'status') = 'pending';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'logout' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_timestamp) = 12;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'location') AS location FROM user_activity WHERE json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'status') = 'failed';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE 'purchase%' AND activity_timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND activity_timestamp < '2023-02-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'category') AS category FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND EXTRACT(DOW FROM activity_timestamp) = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'logout' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'reference_id') AS reference_id FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'purchase' AND json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'status') = 'success';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND date_trunc('month', activity_timestamp) = date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE);
SELECT user_id, activity_type, json_extract_path_text(activity_details, 'email') AS email FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'registration';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity;
SELECT Users.user_id, Users.username, UserActivity.activity_type FROM Users JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id;
SELECT Users.*, UserActivity.activity_type FROM Users JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id;
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, UserActivity.activity_timestamp FROM Users INNER JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id;
SELECT Users.username AS name, Users.email AS mail, UserActivity.activity_timestamp AS timestamp FROM Users JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT Users.username, UserActivity.activity_type FROM Users JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id WHERE UserActivity.activity_type = 'Login';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM Users;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM UserActivity;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM activity_timestamp)) AS avg_activity_time FROM UserActivity;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM Users JOIN UserActivity ON Users.user_id = UserActivity.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM UserActivity GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity;
SELECT u.username, u.email, ua.activity_type FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.activity_id) as num_activities FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_activities > 5
SELECT u.username, u.email, ua.activity_type FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_type = 'Login' AND u.username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT u.username, MAX(ua.activity_timestamp) as last_activity FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY last_activity DESC
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.activity_type) as total_activities FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT u.username, MIN(ua.activity_timestamp) as first_activity FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(DISTINCT ua.activity_type) as unique_activities FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username
SELECT u.username, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ua.activity_timestamp)) as avg_activity_duration FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username

SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, COUNT(ua.activity_type) as num_occurrences FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username, ua.activity_type ORDER BY num_occurrences DESC

SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, COUNT(ua.activity_type) as num_occurrences FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY u.username, ua.activity_type ORDER BY num_occurrences DESC
SELECT u.username, MAX(ua.activity_timestamp) - MIN(ua.activity_timestamp) as activity_duration FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username

SELECT u.username, u.email, ua.activity_type, COUNT(ua.activity_id) as num_activities FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email, ua.activity_type HAVING num_activities > 10
SELECT u.username, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ua.activity_timestamp) as activity_day FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY activity_day ASC

SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ua.activity_timestamp)) as avg_duration FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username, ua.activity_type HAVING AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ua.activity_timestamp)) > 600
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT user_activity.user_id, user_activity.activity_type, recommendations.recommendation_type FROM user_activity INNER JOIN recommendations ON user_activity.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_activity.user_id, user_activity.activity_type, recommendations.recommendation_type FROM user_activity LEFT JOIN recommendations ON user_activity.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(product_id) AS max_product_id FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(product_id) AS average_product_id FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age < 25;
SELECT username, email, timestamp FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, COUNT(*) FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, ua.activity_type FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.recommendation_id, u.username, u.email, r.recommendation_type FROM recommendations r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'New');
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, u.email, r.product_id FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT r.*, u.username, u.age FROM recommendations r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM users);
SELECT user_id, username, email, COUNT(activity_id) FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, 2022 - age AS birth_year FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email, activity_type, timestamp FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM users LEFT JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT recommendation_type, COUNT(*) FROM recommendations GROUP BY recommendation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, recommendation_type FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_activity);
SELECT username, email, MAX(age) FROM users GROUP BY username, email;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM recommendations WHERE recommendations.user_id = users.user_id);

SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(r.recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM users u LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING COUNT(r.recommendation_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM Users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity;
SELECT activity_type, activity_details FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Offers;
SELECT offer_name, offer_discount FROM Offers WHERE offer_type = 'discount';
SELECT * FROM Recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'discount';
SELECT user_id, recommended_item_id FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'item';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type, recommended_item_id FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_type IN ('discount', 'item');
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type, recommended_item_id, timestamp FROM Recommendations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_type, recommended_item_id FROM Recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM Recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(recommended_item_id) AS avg_item_id FROM Recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MIN(recommended_item_id) AS min_item_id FROM Recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(recommended_item_id) AS max_item_id FROM Recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(offer_discount) AS total_discount FROM Offers JOIN Recommendations ON Offers.offer_id = Recommendations.recommended_item_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(offer_discount) AS total_discount FROM Offers INNER JOIN Recommendations ON Offers.offer_id = Recommendations.recommended_item_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT Users.username, Recommendations.recommendation_type FROM Users LEFT JOIN Recommendations ON Users.user_id = Recommendations.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM Users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 30;
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.timestamp, a.activity_type FROM Users u JOIN UserActivity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.recommendation_type, o.offer_name, o.offer_discount FROM Users u JOIN Recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN Offers o ON r.recommended_item_id = o.offer_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS num_activities FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS num_users FROM UserActivity;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Users;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Users;
SELECT recommendation_type, COUNT(*) AS num_recommendations FROM Recommendations GROUP BY recommendation_type;
SELECT user_id, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Users;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(offer_discount) AS total_discount FROM Recommendations r JOIN Offers o ON r.recommended_item_id = o.offer_id WHERE offer_type = 'Discount';
SELECT user_id, AVG(offer_discount) AS avg_discount FROM Recommendations r JOIN Offers o ON r.recommended_item_id = o.offer_id WHERE offer_type = 'Discount' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.recommendation_type, o.offer_type, o.offer_discount FROM Users u JOIN Recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN Offers o ON r.recommended_item_id = o.offer_id;
SELECT u.username, r.recommendation_type, a.activity_type, a.timestamp FROM Users u JOIN Recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN UserActivity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_recommendations FROM Recommendations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_recommendations DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users
SELECT user_id, email FROM users

SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity
SELECT activity_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity

SELECT preference_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM offers
SELECT offer_id, offer_type FROM offers
SELECT offer_id, offer_description FROM offers
SELECT * FROM recommendations
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation_type FROM recommendations
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_type FROM recommendations
SELECT users.user_id, recommendations.user_id FROM users INNER JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id
SELECT users.username, recommendations.recommendation_description FROM users INNER JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe'
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE offer_type = 'discount';
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE preference_name = 'notification';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_description FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type IN ('movie', 'book');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT user_id, count(*) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_name LIKE 'theme%' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'alice');
SELECT username, count(activity_id) FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id GROUP BY username HAVING count(activity_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE offer_description LIKE '%limited time%';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_description FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'music' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT distinct(user_id) FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT username, recommendation_description FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id WHERE recommendation_type = 'book';
SELECT user_id, AVG(activity_timestamp) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT activity_type) > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_activity);
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane') AND recommendation_type = 'restaurant';
SELECT user_id, MAX(activity_timestamp) FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
